content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mr. Wang. Considering the apartment's location and condition, I think 800 Euros per month would be a reasonable price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a high price, Mr. Wang. I'm willing to negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mr. Wang. How about 750 Euros per month? That's a good deal for an apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I disagree, Mr. Wang. The apartment is perfect for city living. 900 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high, Mr. Wang. I can't offer that price. How about 650 Euros per month? That's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I can't accept that price, Mr. Wang. The apartment is in the city center, close to all facilities. 850 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Wang. But the apartment is unfurnished. How about 700 Euros per month? That's a good price for an apartment in this location.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's too low, Mr. Wang. The apartment is in high demand. 950 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't think that's reasonable, Mr. Wang. How about 750 Euros per month? That's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I can't accept that price, Mr. Wang. The apartment is in the city center, close to all facilities. 900 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
